sectionTitle: What we can offer to you

services.name: Financial Investigations
services.subTitle: Let us run the numbers
services.description: Manipulation and misappropriations of funds, fraud, outright theft and a number of other white-collar crimes are a growing factor in the business world..

services.name: Computer Forensics
services.subTitle: We follow the digital trail
services.description: The information age has brought about countless cases of illegal activities that would otherwise be impossible. This technology allows criminals to commit crimes without their faces or names ever being attached..

services.name: Data Breach
services.subTitle: Did you lose some information, we will find out how
services.description: Time is of the essence when responding to a data breach because every second counts when systems are compromised and a companyâ€™s reputation is on the line.

services.name: Missing Person
services.subTitle: Come out, come out wherever you are
services.description: We investigation in the disappearance of missing children and missing adults. Our services assist you in regards to kidnappings, runaways, and adult disappearances

services.name: Employee Theft
services.subTitle: Employee theft totals nearly $40 billion each year
services.description: As hard as it is to believe that someone you hire would actually take from you, it happens every day in all kinds of businesses and in a variety of ways.

services.name: Infidelity
services.subTitle: 51% of married men and 67% of married women did not know of their spouse's where cheating
services.description: Infidelity investigation is one of the most common reasons private investigation is sought out, and we can give you the results you need for real peace of mind.

services.name: Background Check
services.subTitle: Let us offer you piece of mind when making decisions about the future
services.description: We utilize the best and most accurate databases, city, county, state and fedral court records in providing our clients more accurate and complete professional background check reports.

services.name: Insurance Fraud
services.subTitle: How dare you
services.description: An insurance fraud investigation aids by revealing false claims. Don't let your insurance premiums be a waste of money.

services.name: Litigation Support
services.subTitle: We got your back
services.description: We assists clients by gathering and producing evidence, interviewing witnesses, conducting asset searches and jury surveys, analyzing, locating and tracing asset.
